001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
004
005/**
006 * Interface for components that expose a configurable training batch size.
007 * <p>
008 * Batch size controls how many samples are used to compute a single gradient
009 * update during training. It is a training hyperparameter (not an optimizer
010 * hyperparameter).
011 */
012public interface BatchSizeConfigurable extends HyperparameterConfigurable {
013
014    /**
015     * The hyperparameter name for batch size.
016     */
017    String HP_BATCH_SIZE = "batchSize";
018
019    /**
020     * Returns the configured training batch size.
021     *
022     * @return the batch size (must be ≥ 1)
023     */
024    default int getBatchSize() {
025        return getHyperparameter(HP_BATCH_SIZE, Integer.class);
026    }
027
028    /**
029     * Sets the training batch size.
030     *
031     * @param batchSize the batch size (must be ≥ 1)
032     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code batchSize < 1}
033     */
034    default void setBatchSize(int batchSize) {
035        if (batchSize < 1) {
036            throw new IllegalArgumentException();
037        }
038        setHyperparameter(HP_BATCH_SIZE, batchSize);
039    }
040}
